    color: $green;
    text-decoration: none;
    @extend %underlined;
}

    margin: 0 0 1.5rem;

Here’s a really long line of text that should cause this code block to scroll in the x-axis. This will likely happen a lot because Event Store code is generally three or four screens wide on every single line. Because why would you want context when you’re reading a pieced of code?
